Package io.atomix.resource

Base classes and interfaces for creating and operating on replicated state machines in Atomix.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Resource<T extends Resource<T>>
    Base class for fault-tolerant stateful distributed objects.
    ResourceFactory<T extends Resource<?>>
    Resource factory.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractResource<T extends Resource<T>>
    Abstract resource.
    Resource.Config
    Base class for cluster-wide resource configurations.
    Resource.Options
    Base class for local resource options.
    ResourceStateMachine
    Base class for resource state machines.
    ResourceStateMachineExecutor
    Custom executor for executing ResourceStateMachine operations.
    ResourceType
    Identifier for resource metadata and state machine information.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ReadConsistency
    Constants for controlling read consistency constraints on a per-request basis.
    Resource.State
    Resource session state constants.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ResourceException
    Base class for Atomix resource exceptions.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    ResourceTypeInfo
    Annotation for specifying resource state and serialization information.

Package io.atomix.resource Description

Base classes and interfaces for creating and operating on replicated state machines in Atomix.

This package provides base classes for Atomix distributed resources. At their core, distributed resources are standalone Copycat StateMachine implementations which can be accessed by a high-level proxy API. All resources can be run as state machines in a Copycat cluster or multiple state machines in a single cluster can be managed by the Atomix resource manager.

Author:
Jordan Halterman
